title: new secret agent xin is missing his beifcases on pbe
body: im hoping its a bug can i get some info if it will be added or not? :(

replies.body:
Hey! 

I caught up with the team who's working on Xin at the moment, and they've said that this is a bug, and they plan on adding them back!  They've been shuffling files around, and this one wasn't set up correctly. 

Luckily, he's still on PBE, and there's plenty of time to fix him up before he goes live. 

Thanks for the report! 
{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
